title: FITLIFE - Exercise Tracking & Guidance
summary: Smart India Hackathon 2023 Winner. Custom pose estimation and exercise tracking web app.

details.overview: Developed a comprehensive web application for real-time exercise tracking using computer vision. The system provides guidance and feedback to users to ensure proper form.
details.researchQuestion: How can browser-based pose estimation be optimized for real-time feedback on commodity hardware?
challenges: Real-time pose estimation latency in browser
details.methodology: Utilized custom ML models for pose detection and analyzed keypoints to provide corrective feedback.
details.results: Won Smart India Hackathon 2023. Accurate counting and form analysis for multiple exercises.
details.futureWork: Expanding to more complex compound movements and mobile app integration.

title: Polyp Segmentation Using UNet 3+
summary: Medical imaging segmentation achieving 92% IoU and 90% Dice Coefficient.

details.overview: Built a refined UNet 3+ architecture for the precise segmentation of polyps in colonoscopy images, critical for early cancer detection.
details.researchQuestion: Does UNet 3+ offer significant improvements over standard UNet for variable-sized polyp segmentation?
challenges: High class imbalance in medical datasets
Variability in polyp size and texture
details.methodology: Implemented UNet 3+ with deep supervision. Preprocessed medical datasets to normalize lighting and scale.
details.results: Achieved 92% IoU and 90% Dice Coefficient, outperforming baseline models.
details.futureWork: Testing on video data for real-time colonoscopy assistance.

title: Stereo Vision Self-Driving Simulation
summary: Depth estimation and navigation using Stereo ESP32-CAM and Machine Learning.

details.overview: Developed a simulation for autonomous driving using a custom stereo vision setup with ESP32-CAM modules.
details.researchQuestion: Can low-cost ESP32 modules perform reliable stereo depth estimation for navigation?
challenges: Depth estimation processing on limited hardware
details.methodology: Integrated ML-based navigation using TensorFlow and OpenCV with depth maps generated from the stereo setup.
details.results: Functional depth estimation and basic autonomous navigation in simulation.
details.futureWork: Deploying on a physical RC car chassis.

title: Virtual Piano - Interactive Music App
summary: Computer vision-based virtual piano using hand tracking and segmentation.

details.overview: Created an interactive application that allows users to play a virtual piano using hand movements captured by a webcam.
details.researchQuestion: How to map spatial hand coordinates to musical notes with low latency?
details.methodology: Used OpenCV and MediaPipe for hand segmentation and movement detection to trigger dynamic screen-based interactions.
details.futureWork: Adding gesture control for volume and other effects.
